solution_line_template: He found {cans_at_home} and his grandparents gave him three times that amount so he got {cans_at_home}*{grandparents_multiplier} = <<{cans_at_home}*{grandparents_multiplier}={cans_from_grandparents}>>{cans_from_grandparents} cans from his grandparents

All total he collected {cans_at_home} cans, the {cans_from_grandparents} from his grandparents, {cans_from_neighbor} from the neighbor and {cans_from_dad} from his dad for a total of {cans_at_home}+{cans_from_grandparents}+{cans_from_neighbor}+{cans_from_dad} = <<{cans_at_home}+{cans_from_grandparents}+{cans_from_neighbor}+{cans_from_dad}={total_cans_collected}>>{total_cans_collected} cans

He agreed to put half of the ${total_money_earned} earned into savings so he will save {total_money_earned}/{savings_divisor}=$<<{total_money_earned}/{savings_divisor}={money_to_savings}>>{money_to_savings}
